dcterms:description: A dataset used for predicting the popularity of Reddit threads, focusing on the sequential decision-making problem based on a large-scale real-world natural language dataset.
dcterms:title: Reddit popularity prediction dataset

dcterms:description: An external knowledge source consisting of discussions about world events, used to augment the state representation in the reinforcement learning model.
dcterms:title: Worldnews subreddit

dcterms:description: Datasets from various Reddit communities used in the experimental setup for predicting popular comments.
dcterms:title: Subreddit datasets (askscience, askmen, todayilearned, askwomen, politics)
